name: Update User Progresss
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint to update the user progress on specific topic

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id: STRING,
course_topic_id: STRING,
status: STRING ( Options : COMPLETED / INCOMPLETE )

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentorTopicProgress

raw 
  {
    "user_id":"1",
    "mentor_course_topic_id":"1",
    "status":"Completed"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:52.367Z","updated_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:52.367Z","mentor_topic_progress_id":21,"user_id":"1","mentor_course_topic_id":"1","status":"Completed","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
